actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with amendment, S. Rept. 94-868.

actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1472.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #755 (360-20).

official_title: An Act to amend the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964 to change certain procedures in order to improve the operation of the programs under such Act and to make the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in such programs.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1472) Makes the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible, under the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act, to participate in Federal programs designed for research and development of the commercial fisheries resources of the United States. Requires unused funds allocated pursuant to such programs to remain available for the use of other States. Allows States receiving six percent of the funds initially apportioned to use funds voluntarily released by other States. Authorizes advance payments to States on approved projects.

titles.title: A bill to make the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in certain Federal fisheries programs, and for other purposes.

An Act to amend the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964 to change certain procedures in order to improve the operation of the programs under such Act and to make the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in such programs.
